attributes.action: Enforce the repayment of MPs expenses claimed over the last year that are clearly not normal expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the revelation under the freedom on information act obtained by the BBC of details of a handfull of MP's expenses Gordon Brown should ensure the repayment of all MP's claims except claims for 'reasonable' expenses. This government tried all means possible to stop the publication of their expenses and now they have been revealed the public can see why.  £4,000 in one year for food, TV licence etc.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
